skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 1 enemy.

Has a 50% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy. This debuff cannot be resisted.

[Only available when Venus is on the same team.]
